xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 06 September 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 10:55 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 10:56 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 10:56 <sdumitriu> How's it going? 10:56 <bvancea> hey 10:56 <bvancea> pretty good 10:56 <bvancea> actually just got back from a conference 10:56 <bvancea> for my second paper 10:57 <bvancea> and you? 10:57 <sdumitriu> Working hard 10:58 <bvancea> nice :) 10:58 <bvancea> for the medsavant realease 10:58 <sdumitriu> No 10:58 <sdumitriu> For the PhenoTips release... 10:58 <bvancea> ah, anoter release 10:58 <bvancea> when are you having the release? 10:59 <sdumitriu> According to the plan, now 10:59 <sdumitriu> But there are still many features not committed 11:13 <bvancea> ah, I see 11:13 <bvancea> the indexing of variants is going much slower than expected :| 11:13 <sdumitriu> Hm... 11:13 <bvancea> last week I've changed to code to integrate with the medsavant workflow 11:14 <bvancea> and there are a lot of temp files which need to be created 11:14 <bvancea> at every step 11:14 <bvancea> I've tryied to index 1.5GB vcf.gz archive 11:15 <bvancea> which apparently got expanded into 18GB vcf file 11:15 <bvancea> I've actually let it run for 24 hours 11:15 <bvancea> but eventually I needed to use the computer 11:16 <bvancea> now I'm trying to write a script to split large vcf files into smaller ones 11:16 <bvancea> and index them sequentially 11:18 <bvancea> or I could try to find a lot of small vcf files 11:36 <bvancea> btw, did a medsavant realease happen? 11:37 <sdumitriu> Not yet... 11:37 <sdumitriu> In two weeks 11:37 <bvancea> ah, I see 11:38 <bvancea> so I suppose we're going to have another hangout next week? 11:39 <sdumitriu> Yes 11:40 <sdumitriu> Can you send a doodle? 11:40 <bvancea> sure thing 11:44 <bvancea> blah, they've changed the doodle UI 11:44 <bvancea> everything's moved 11:53 <bvancea> link to doodle: http://doodle.com/qedv3e6uppez8wuv
